Yes, there are many resources that can help you find out more about VR games and simulations. Here are a few suggestions:

1. Steam: This is a popular gaming platform that has a wide selection of VR games and simulations available. You can browse through different categories of VR games, read reviews, and see ratings from other users. 2. Oculus Store: If you are interested in the Oculus Rift or Quest, the Oculus Store is a good place to look for VR games and apps. You can browse through different categories, read reviews, and see ratings. 3. YouTube: There are many VR gaming channels on YouTube that showcase different VR games and simulations. You can find reviews, gameplay videos, and tutorials. 4. Reddit: There are several subreddits dedicated to VR gaming, such as r/oculus and r/vive. You can find discussions about VR games, reviews, and tips on these subreddits. 5. VR gaming websites: There are several websites dedicated to VR gaming, such as UploadVR and Road to VR. These websites provide news, reviews, and guides to different VR games and simulations. I hope these suggestions help you find the information you need to make an informed decision about your VR headset purchase.
